entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Thursday 27 April 2023
